languages.text:
Все обитатели Простора уповают на Вольного Торговца в трудный час.
~// +33% к восстановлению особых способностей в конце боя. Любые красные варп-маршруты становятся оранжевыми.

All the inhabitants of the Expanse place their trust in the Rogue Trader during their hour of need.
~// The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} restores +33% to the cooldown of ultimate abilities at the end of space combat. Red warp routes always become orange
languages.original_text:
Все обитатели Простора уповают на Вольного Торговца в трудный час.
~// +33% к восстановлению особых способностей в конце боя. Любые красные варп-маршруты становятся оранжевыми.

traits.locale_text: All the inhabitants of the Expanse put their trust in the Rogue Trader in their hour of need.
All the inhabitants of the Expanse put their trust in the Rogue Trader in their hour of need.

All the inhabitants of the Expanse place their trust in the Rogue Trader during their hour of need.
~// The flagship restores +33% to the cooldown of ultimate abilities at the end of space combat. Red warp routes always become orange

All the inhabitants of the Expanse place their trust in the Rogue Trader during their hour of need.
~// The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} restores +33% to the cooldown of ultimate abilities at the end of space combat. Red warp routes always become orange

All the inhabitants of the Expanse place their trust in the Rogue Trader during their hour of need.
~// The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} restores +33% to the cooldown of ultimate abilities at the end of space combat. Red warp routes always become orange

languages.text:
在这危急时刻，科罗努斯扩区的所有居民都对行商浪人充满信任。
~// 每场太空战结束时，{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}的终极能力获得33%充能。此外，红色的亚空间航线会自动变为橙色航线。
languages.original_text:
All the inhabitants of the Expanse place their trust in the Rogue Trader during their hour of need.
~// The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} restores +33% to the cooldown of ultimate abilities at the end of space combat. Red warp routes always become orange

traits.locale_text: 在这危急时刻，科罗努斯扩区的所有居民都对行商浪人充满信任。

languages.text:
エクスパンスの住民は皆、困ったときには自由開拓者に頼る。
~//{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}は宇宙での戦闘終了時に究極アビリティのクールダウンを+33%回復する。また、赤い<歪み>経路が必ずオレンジになる。
languages.original_text:
All the inhabitants of the Expanse place their trust in the Rogue Trader during their hour of need.
~// The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} restores +33% to the cooldown of ultimate abilities at the end of space combat. Red warp routes always become orange

traits.locale_text: エクスパンスの住民は皆、困った時にはローグトレーダーに頼る。

languages.text:
Todos los habitantes de la Extensión confían en {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente en sus momentos de necesidad.
~// La {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} recupera un +33 % del tiempo de recuperación de las capacidades definitivas al terminar el combate espacial. Las rutas de disformidad rojas siempre se vuelven naranjas.
languages.original_text:
All the inhabitants of the Expanse place their trust in the Rogue Trader during their hour of need.
~// The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} restores +33% to the cooldown of ultimate abilities at the end of space combat. Red warp routes always become orange

traits.locale_text: Todos los habitantes confían en {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente en sus momentos de necesidad.

languages.text:
Tous les habitants des Étendues savent qu'ils peuvent se tourner vers {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} lorsqu'ils ont besoin d'aide.
~// Le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} accélère de +33 % le rechargement des capacités ultimes à l'issue d'un combat spatial. Les routes Warp rouges deviennent toujours orange.
languages.original_text:
All the inhabitants of the Expanse place their trust in the Rogue Trader during their hour of need.
~// The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} restores +33% to the cooldown of ultimate abilities at the end of space combat. Red warp routes always become orange

traits.locale_text: Tous les habitants des Étendues savent qu'ils peuvent se tourner vers {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} lorsqu'ils ont besoin d'aide.

languages.text:
Alle Einwohner der Ausdehnung vertrauen in der Stunde der Not auf.
~// Das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} stellt am Ende des Weltraumkampfs 33 % der Abklingzeit der ultimativen Fähigkeiten wieder her. Rote Warprouten werden immer orange
languages.original_text:
All the inhabitants of the Expanse place their trust in the Rogue Trader during their hour of need.
~// The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} restores +33% to the cooldown of ultimate abilities at the end of space combat. Red warp routes always become orange

traits.locale_text: Alle Einwohner der Ausdehnung vertrauen in der Stunde der Not auf {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}.

languages.text:
Enginlik'in tüm sakinleri, ihtiyaç duydukları anlarda Hür Tacir'e güveniyorlar.
~// {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Sancak gemisinin{/g} üstün kabiliyetlerinin dolum süresi, uzay çatışmasının sonunda +%33 hızlanır. Kırmızı öteboyut rotaları her zaman turuncuya dönüşür.
languages.original_text:
All the inhabitants of the Expanse place their trust in the Rogue Trader during their hour of need.
~// The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} restores +33% to the cooldown of ultimate abilities at the end of space combat. Red warp routes always become orange
